mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category_daily_statistics( statistics_date, category_id, daily_views, totle_views, daily_downloads, daily_uploads )VALUES ( #{statisticsDate}, #{categoryId}, #{dailyViews}, #{totleViews}, #{dailyDownloads}, #{dailyUploads} )
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM category_daily_statistics
ORDER BY `statistics_date` DESC
SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM category_daily_statistics cd LEFT JOIN doc_category c ON cd.`category_id` = c.`id` WHERE c.`icon` IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cd.`statistics_date` DESC,cd.`totle_views` DESC
